summary: A small shack (no load doors) in a tree located between Riverwood and Whiterun. No DLCs required, CoT compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#38761d][size=5]- Description -[/size][/color]

[size=3]A shack in a tree with no load doors located between Riverwood and Whiterun.
Has no Vanilla rain and no Climates of Tamriel rain inside.
If you use True Storms with CoT, I tested it and it works (no rain inside).[/size]

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75500/?]Story addon for Snapneck Shack
[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4199?]Skyrim Special Edition Version[/url][/size]

[u][color=#ff7700][size=3]NO DLCs ARE REQUIRED
CLIMATES OF TAMRIEL IS REQUIRED for (CoT) file[/size][/color][/u]

[youtube]7MtMUBkcgPA[/youtube]
[size=3]Video by: Toggle AI[/size]

[color=#38761d][size=5]- Features -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#38761d]->[/color] Safe storage, Navmeshed, map and horse marker,
[color=#38761d]->[/color] Lightable lanterns and fire
(cook pot can be moved after the fire is lit and fire extinguished after the cook pot is moved back)
[color=#38761d]->[/color] Spare bed, Changeable alchemy and enchanting station, tanning rack, woodcutterÂ 
[color=#38761d]->[/color] Liftable ladder, so enemies can't reach you
(it is liftable only from the house, not the ground so don't jump down while ladder is lifted)
[color=#38761d]->[/color] Window and door covers, custom sits (bed and crate)
[color=#38761d]-> [/color]1 Weapon rack and shrine of Kyneareth
+
a friendly hawk[/size]

[size=3]Triggers are positioned logically, so look around and you will find them.[/size][size=3]
[/size]

[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][size=5][/size][/url][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -[/url][/size][size=5]
[/size][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod[/size][/font][/center]
author: 1xmiha
